welcome_message_body: Welcome to Malang, a city known for its charming colonial architecture, beautiful landscapes, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Malang has to offer during your visit!

restaurants.name: Depot Gang Djangkrik
restaurants.description: Depot Gang Djangkrik is a chinese restaurant located in Malang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Kawi Atas No. 26, Malang, Jawa Timur

restaurants.name: KDS Restaurant
restaurants.description: KDS Restaurant is a cantonese restaurant located in Malang.
restaurants.address: Ijen Nirwana Residence, Blok A No. 16 (Jl. Ijen Nirwana Raya), Malang, Jawa Timur

restaurants.name: My Kopi-O! Indonesian Bistro
restaurants.description: My Kopi-O! Indonesian Bistro is a café located in Malang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Tenes No. 14, Malang, Jawa Timur

restaurants.name: Rujak Manis Ananas Pak Bejo
restaurants.description: Rujak Manis Ananas Pak Bejo is a salad restaurant located in Malang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Ananas No. 1 (Jl. Simpang Langsep), Malang, Jawa Timur

restaurants.name: Ayam Goreng Tenes
restaurants.description: Ayam Goreng Tenes is a fried chicken joint located in Malang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Tenes No. 12, Malang, Jawa Timur
